casebody.data:
Brock Jerel PERRY, Appellant-Defendant,
v.
STATE of Indiana, Appellee-Plaintiff. Court of Appeals Case No. 71A03-1711-CR-2752 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED April 26, 2018

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

ALTICE, J., Concurs.
